definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)

sentences.english: Low phosphor formula ensure the translator of ternary catalysis work normally.
sentences.chinese: 低磷配方确保三元催化转换器正常工作。

sentences.english: The sturdy crossfader module can be placed on the left or right side.
sentences.chinese: »唱片平滑转换器可放置在左侧或右侧。

sentences.english: Remove the upper flywheel and converter housing bolts and loosen the bottom bolts.
sentences.chinese: 拆卸上部飞轮及转换器外壳螺栓，拧松底部螺栓。

sentences.english: The left and right channels are combined to one digital data string via a multiplexor .
sentences.chinese: 通过多路转换器将左右声道合成一个声道。

sentences.english: Search for and instantiate the appropriate convertor.
sentences.chinese: 搜索并实例化适当的转换器。

sentences.english: I want to interface analog to digital converter through SPI and I2C.
sentences.chinese: 我想通过模拟接口SPI和I2C数字转换器。

sentences.english: The thesis proposes a boost converter to achieve a power factor correction circuit.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一种以升压转换器达成功因校正的电路。

sentences.english: The circuit structure is using a fly-back converter voltage.
sentences.chinese: 这个转换器是利用返驰式电路架构实现。

sentences.english: "We need a game-changer like the green revolution was for agriculture, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，“我们需要像农业的绿色革命一样的转换器。”

sentences.english: In the base station, the electrical mm-wave signal was generated by O/E conversion.
sentences.chinese: 在基站中通过光电转换器产生电毫米波。

sentences.english: There are no accumulators in this room, just current transducers.
sentences.chinese: 在这个房间里没有蓄电池，只有电流转换器。

sentences.english: The converters can be adapted by Reischmann Informatik to the needs of a client on a consulting basis if required.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据客户的需要，改编这些转换器。

sentences.english: This configuration file can also be used to add the convertors.
sentences.chinese: 此配置文件还可以用于添加转换器。

sentences.english: The post-stage circuit is an asymmetrical half-bridge converter with zero–voltage switching features.
sentences.chinese: 后级电路为具有零电压切换的非对称半桥转换器。

sentences.english: The output of the sample - and - hold system now goes into an analog - to - digital converter .
sentences.chinese: 取样和保持系统的输出现在又进入一个模数转换器。

definition: rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
